topic.title: CANCER OR SYMPTOMATIC BREAST REFERRAL PATIENT STATUS
topic.shortdesc: The status of a REFERRAL REQUEST for a PATIENT referred with a suspected cancer, or referred with breast symptoms with cancer not originally suspected.
